login.title: Login to Your Account
login.subtitle: Enter your account & password to login
login.switchRoleInfo: You can switch roles in 'My Account'
login.errorMessage: Login failed, please check your account or password.
login.missingFields: Email and password cannot be empty
login.temporarilyLocked: Your account has been temporarily locked due to multiple failed attempts. Please try again later.
login.temporarilyLockedUntil: Your account has been temporarily locked. Please try again after {time}.
login.banned: Your account has been banned. Please contact customer service for details.
